languages.text: {n}Когда последние посетители покидают зал суда, преисполненное благодати лицо префекта обращается к вам.{/n} "Леди Теодора устраивала подобные судилища, дабы вселять в своих подданных веру в Лекс Империалис и страх перед его нарушением. Чрезвычайно полезная практика, не находите?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда последние посетители покидают зал суда, преисполненное благодати лицо Префекта обращается к вам.{/n} "Леди Теодора устраивала подобные судилища, дабы вселять в своих подданных веру в Лекс Империалис и страх перед его нарушением. Чрезвычайно полезная практика, не находите?"
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"
languages.original_text: {n}Когда последние посетители покидают зал суда, преисполненное благодати лицо префекта обращается к вам.{/n} "Леди Теодора устраивала подобные судилища, дабы вселять в своих подданных веру в Лекс Империалис и страх перед его нарушением. Чрезвычайно полезная практика, не находите?"

traits.locale_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

{n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the Prefect looks you up and down.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to entertain her subjects, as well as strengthen their faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. I hope this was another enjoyable opportunity for you to demonstrate your limitless power."

{n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the Prefect looks you up and down.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to entertain her subjects and to strengthen their faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. I hope this served as another enjoyable opportunity for you to demonstrate your limitless power."

{n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the Prefect looks you up and down.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to entertain her subjects and to strengthen their faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. I hope this served as another enjoyable opportunity for you to demonstrate your limitless power."

{n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

languages.text: {n}Als die letzten Zuschauer den Gerichtssaal verlassen, wendet sich die Präfektin mit einem erfreuten Gesichtsausdruck dir zu.{/n} "Lady Theodora hat Gerichtsversammlungen wie diese abgehalten, um den Glauben ihrer Untertanen an das Lex Imperia zu stärken und sie davon abzuhalten, dagegen zu verstoßen. Eine ausgesprochen nützliche Maßnahme, findet Ihr nicht auch?"
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die letzten Zuschauer den Gerichtssaal verlassen, wendet sich die Präfektin mit einem erfreuten Gesichtsausdruck dir zu.{/n} "Lady Theodora hat Gerichtsversammlungen wie diese abgehalten, um den Glauben ihrer Untertanen an das Lex Imperia zu stärken und sie davon abzuhalten, dagegen zu verstoßen. Eine ausgesprochen nützliche Maßnahme, findet Ihr nicht auch?"

languages.text: {n}Alors que les derniers assistants quittent la salle d'audience, le préfet se tourne vers vous d'un air ravi.{/n} « Dame Théodora tenait ce genre de séances pour affermir la foi de ses sujets en la Lex Imperialis... et leur crainte de l'enfreindre. Une pratique des plus utiles, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que les derniers assistants quittent la salle d'audience, le préfet se tourne vers vous d'un air ravi.{/n} « Dame Théodora tenait ce genre de séances pour affermir la foi de ses sujets en la Lex Imperialis... et leur crainte de l'enfreindre. Une pratique des plus utiles, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}最后几位侍从离开大厅时，行政官转向了你，脸上带着欣喜的表情。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人以前也举行过这样的审判，强化所有臣民对帝国律法的忠诚，加深他们对律法的恐惧之情。这种做法非常有效，您也是这么觉得的吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: {n}最后几位侍从离开大厅时，行政官转向了你，脸上带着欣喜的表情。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人以前也举行过这样的审判，强化所有臣民对帝国律法的忠诚，加深他们对律法的恐惧之情。这种做法非常有效，您也是这么觉得的吧？”

languages.text: {n}Mientras los últimos asistentes abandonan la sala, la prefecta se gira hacia ti con una expresión de felicidad.{/n} «Lady Theodora celebraba tribunales como este para reforzar la fe de sus súbditos en la Lex Imperialis y el miedo a quebrantarla. Una práctica muy útil, ¿no le parece?».
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras los últimos asistentes abandonan la sala, la prefecta se gira hacia ti con una expresión de felicidad.{/n} «Lady Theodora celebraba tribunales como este para reforzar la fe de sus súbditos en la Lex Imperialis y el miedo a quebrantarla. Una práctica muy útil, ¿no le parece?».

languages.text: {n}最後の従者が法廷を後にすると、総監は嬉しそうな表情で振り返った。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラは、臣民のレックス・インペリアへの信仰と、それを破ることへの恐怖を植え付けるために、このような法廷を開いていたのです。実に有益な慣習だと思いませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: {n}最後の従者が法廷を後にすると、総監は嬉しそうな表情で振り返った。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラは、臣民のレックス・インペリアへの信仰と、それを破ることへの恐怖を植え付けるために、このような法廷を開いていたのです。実に有益な慣習だと思いませんか？」

languages.text: {n}Son görevliler de mahkeme salonundan ayrılırken prefekt, yüzünden memnun bir ifadeyle sana dönüyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, tebaasının Lex İmperialis'e olan inancını ve onu ihlal etme korkusunu artırmak için böyle duruşmalar düzenlerdi. Çok faydalı bir uygulama, sizce de öyle değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}As the last attendants leave the courtroom, the prefect turns to you with a delighted expression.{/n} "Lady Theodora held court sessions like this to strengthen her subjects' faith in the Lex Imperialis and their fear of breaching it. A most useful practice, wouldn't you agree?"

Çok faydalı bir uygulama, sizce de öyle değil mi?"
